text.section: If, after the police arrest an intoxicated individual for a criminal offense, the individual seems to require emergency medical treatment, the police immediately shall take the individual to a detoxification center or other appropriate health care facility as defined in § 19-114(d) of this article.

section.section: If necessary, after medical treatment, the police shall transport the individual to a detoxification facility.
The individual may be admitted to the detoxification facility in accordance with the provisions of § 8-501(d) of this subtitle.
